mapper.insert: INSERT INTO assignComm(num, subject, content, userId, regDate, thumbnail, zip, addr1, addr2, pNum) VALUES(ASSIGNCOMM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{thumbnail}, #{zip}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{pNum})

INSERT INTO assignCommDetail(num, deposit, monthly, expense, area, bFloor, floor, parking, elevator, transDate) VALUES(ASSIGNCOMM_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{deposit}, #{monthly}, #{expense}, #{area}, #{bFloor}, #{floor}, #{parking}, #{elevator}, #{transDate})
INSERT INTO assignCommImg(imgNum, num, imgName) VALUES(assignCommImg_seq.NEXTVAL, ASSIGNCOMM_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{imgName})
mapper.update: UPDATE assignCommImg SET imgName = #{imgName} WHERE imgNum = #{imgNum} AND num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT a.num, subject, content, userId, regDate, updateDate, pNum, zip, addr1, addr2, thumbnail, deposit, monthly, expense, area, floor, bFloor, parking, elevator, transDate FROM assignComm a JOIN assignCommDetail ad ON a.num = ad.num WHERE a.num = #{num}
SELECT imgNum, imgName FROM assignCommImg WHERE num = #{num} ORDER BY imgNum ASC

SELECT a.num, subject, content, userId, TO_CHAR(regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), updateDate, pNum, zip, addr1, addr2, thumbnail, deposit, monthly, expense, area, bFloor, parking, elevator, transDate FROM assignComm a JOIN assignCommDetail ad ON a.num = ad.num ORDER BY regDate DESC
